nodes.text: Jasko was a male individual who attended the Arkanis Academy on the planet Arkanis. As a cadet in this academy, Jasko was a candidate to become an officer in the Imperial Military. Jasko, however, washed out of the academy. He harbored a dislike for the academy's overseer, Commandant Brendol Hux. He enjoyed making life difficult for him by opening a business known as "Jasko's" in Scaparus Port, a small port town located only a couple of klicks from the academy. There, he charged a steep price for private, unmonitored comm booth services and was also known as the only individual in the port able to make a decent cup of caf.
